scripts.check: pnpm run pkg:check && pnpm run pkg:format && pnpm run ts:check --r --stream
scripts.dev: pnpm run build --filter '@orchest/client-*^...' && pnpm run dev --filter '@orchest/client-*...' --r --parallel
scripts.sandbox: pnpm run build --filter '@orchest/sandbox^...' && pnpm run dev --filter '@orchest/sandbox...' --r --parallel
